Articles.Content: have they changed the mechanic where you could get science from space around kerbin by sending an empty crew report. Ie by not actually sending any science. I can't seem to get it to work anymore.
Hmm, hadn't noticed any change in this. Did you recover or transmit?
I transmitted. You can't recover nothing. Although you used to be able to transmit nothing and get the contract completion for it.

I've got a satellite with a thermometer and an antenna orbiting Kerbin. Every time that "science from space around Kerbin" comes up, I go to this satellite, log the temperature, and transmit it. I get zero science for the actual data itself because I've already done this experiment scads of times, but I do get the science listed as a reward of the contract.
Right, but the science rewards from contracts were reduced

sounds like it's the bug from Science Alert, It was killing science transmissions silently. Had this same problem and wondered if they had nerfed repeat science.

check the new version. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76793-1-0-ScienceAlert-1-8-6-Experiment-availability-feedback-%28April-28%29?p=1878092&viewfull=1#post1878092
